title: Case of Study: Promoting a healthy culture within engineering teams
description: Examine the critical role of leadership in fostering a healthy culture within engineering teams. We argue that a technology leader's role extends beyond strategy and implementation to actively promoting a positive work environment.

title: Business Intelligence Enterprise Project: Adventure Works Cycles
description: Enhance knowledge creation by streamlining data management through the creation of ETL pipelines and data refinement processes. This enables smarter, data-driven decisions supported by a custom web application and dashboards.

title: Circuitos: Discover Your Artistic Hub
description: Discover and share your artistic and cultural interests with a like-minded community. Our platform is a go-to for anyone who wants to explore new experiences and connect with others who love art as much as they do.

title: Idea: Application for promoting cultural activities
description: Platform that helps you find and participate in cultural events by creating a network tailored to your specific preferences. We make it simple to discover and connect with a community of people who share your artistic and cultural interests.
type: e-Business Concept and Market Niche Analysis

title: The Movie and TV series database (TMDB)
description: Full-stack web application designed for anyone who loves movies and TV shows. It provides a seamless, fast way to browse a comprehensive catalog of titles, giving you all the details you need in one place. You can explore a wide variety of content through a user-friendly interface.

title: Management Dashboard
description: Management dashboard designed to streamline employee data handling. It's a simple web application that provides you with complete control over your team's information. With straightforward CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality.

title: Visualization Dashboard for Monitoring
description: Web application designed to help you easily understand complex data. Using the powerful D3.js library, it creates interactive and visually engaging charts for a business intelligence dashboard. You can effortlessly switch between different timeframes—by day, week, month, or year—to analyze error reports and other data.

title: Restaurant's finder and their menus
description: Conceptual application designed to help users discover and connect with local restaurants. Built as a Progressive Web app (PWA), it gives you the convenience of a native app without requiring a download from an app store. Using your device's Geolocation API, the app instantly finds the restaurants closest to you.

title: Pokédex: Gotta Catch 'Em All
description: Progressive web application (PWA) built under Svelte, a modern JavaScript framework. It leverages the Pokémon API to provide a comprehensive and engaging Pokédex experience, data persistence with LocalStorage, the SpeechSynthesis, and Plotly charts.
